## Remarks This constructor instantiates a compiled regular expression whose predefined regular expression pattern is the following:
`\G<%\s*@(\s*(?<attrname>\w[\w:]*(?=\W))(\s*(?<equal>=)\s*"(?<attrval>[^"]*)"|\s*(?<equal>=)\s*'(?<attrval>[^']*)'|\s*(?<equal>=)\s*(?<attrval>[^\s%>]*)|(?<equal>)(?<attrval>\s*?)))*\s*?%>`
